bill.title: Public Safety; Fire Protection; Novelty Lighters
bill.description: Prohibits the sale or distribution of novelty lighters within the State. (SB173 HD2)

referrals.name: Public Safety, Government Operations, and Military Affairs

history.action: (S) Introduced.
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to PGM, JDL.
(S) The committee(s) on PGM has scheduled a public hearing on 02-01-11 3:30PM in conference room 224.

(S) The committee(s) on PGM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in PGM were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Espero, Kidani, Baker, Ryan; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Slom.
(S) Reported from PGM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 84) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to JDL.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to JDL.
(S) The committee(s) on JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 02-23-11 9:00AM in conference room 016.

(S) The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro, Gabbard; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Ihara.
(S) Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 580) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
(S) 48 Hrs. Notice 03-08-11.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 21; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 2 (Senator(s) Slom, Solomon). Excused, 2 (Senator(s) Kim, Kouchi). Transmitted to House.
(H) Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 100) in amended form (SD 2).
(H) Pass First Reading
(H) Referred to PBM, JUD, referral sheet 33
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by PBM on Thursday, 03-17-11 8:30AM in House conference room 309.

(H) The committees on PBM recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 11 Ayes: Representative(s) Aquino, Cullen, Ichiyama, M. Lee, Luke, Saiki, Takai, Takumi, Yamashita, Johanson; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Fontaine; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Souki.
(H) Reported from PBM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1096) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.
(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with none voting no (0) and Belatti, Chang, Tokioka excused (3).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Tuesday, 04-05-11 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 14 Ayes: Keith-Agaran, Rhoads, Brower, Cabanilla, Herkes, Ito, Luke, McKelvey, B. Oshiro, Souki, Tsuji, Fontaine, Marumoto, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Carroll.
(H) Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1462) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 04-12-11.
(H) Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Awana excused (1). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 430).
(S) Senate disagrees with House amendments.
(H) Received notice of disagreement (Sen. Com. No. 605).
(S) Senate Conferees appointed: Espero, Chair; Hee, Co-Chair(s); Ryan.
(H) House conferees appointed: Aquino, Keith-Agaran Co-Chairs; Cullen, Saiki, Fontaine.
(H) House conferee(s) replaced: Representative(s) Rhoads replaced Representative(s) Keith-Agaran as Co-Chairs.
(H) Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 643).
(S) Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 652).
(S) Received notice of change in conferees (Hse. Com. No. 656).
(S) Conference committee meeting scheduled for 04-21-11 1:45PM in conference room 312.

(S) The Senate Conference Managers recommend that the Senate agree to the House amendments. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Espero, Hee, Ryan; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
(S) Reconsideration of action taken on 04-14-11 in disagreeing to the House amendments.
(S) Senate agrees with House amendments. Placed on the calendar for Final Reading on 04-29-11.
(S) One Day Notice 04-29-11.
(S) Deferred until 05-03-11.
(S) Passed Final Reading. 24 Aye(s); Aye(s) with reservations: none . 1 No(es): Slom. 0 Excused: none.
(H) Received notice of reconsideration, Senate agreement, and Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 696).
(S) Enrolled to Governor.
(H) Became law without the Governor's signature, Act 224, 7/12/2011, (Gov. Msg. No. 1328).
(S) Became law without the Governor's signature, Act 224, 7/12/2011, (Gov. Msg. No. 1328).
